resources.string:
Uncover two matching cards at once
to eliminate them from the game.
Beware of the timer, the less the time you take the more you score
but make sure to finish before timer runs out.

""	"The University was founded through Harambee spirit on 5th January, 1972, as Western College of Arts and Applied Sciences (WECO) under the stewardship of the former fiery MP, Masinde Muliro. As chairman of the project executive committee, Muliro worked with Prof. Reuben J. Olembo (then Head, Department of Botany University of Nairobi) as secretary."
""
""	"The establishment of the College was in response to the needs of the people of Western province to have a College which would provide a training ground for technical manpower requirements for the province and the nation. The College was also expected to inculcate a sense of self-help and self-reliance among its students and facilitate active participation of youth in national development."
""
""	"The first batch of 24 students who were drawn from all parts of the country, joined on March 24th 1977, and enrolled for certificate and diploma in courses which included mechanical and motor vehicle, electrical, electronic, agriculture, water, building, architecture, accounting, finance among others."
""
""	" In December 2002, WECO became WUCST (Western University College of Science and Technology) after being elevated to a Constituent College of Moi University. Early 2007, President Kibaki elevated WUCST to a full university by assenting to a bill which also changed the name to MMUST."
""
""
""
""
""
""
Martin is a Computer Science student who enjoys designing websites, mobile applications as well as addictive android games.

The goal of the game is to pop as many balloons as possible before they escape. At the beginning of the game, you have five lives. After each level, the number of balloons increases as well as the speed they appear. So test your reflexes to see how fast you are :)
Come and try Pop Balloon Android game!
The aim of this game is to earn as many points as possible. \n
You can use coins to resurrect after losing in any of the three games. \n\n Earn coins by referring your friends to the app or by watching a simple ad video.
Ask your friend to enter the code below during installation. \nEach invite will earn you a hundred coins. \nYou can invite as many friends as you can.

string.name: invite_friend_title
string.u: INVITE FRIENDS TO EARN FREE COINS

resources.string: Have you been invited by a friend? Enter their referral code here.\n\nLeave this space empty if you do not have a referral code.
Share this app with your friends and earn free coins. \nEach invite will earn you a hundred coins. \nYou can invite as many friends as you can.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Simple app for handling Bluetooth discovery and pairing.
Turning on Bluetooth and looking for devices…
No nearby devices found. Tap on the bottom-right button to start a new device discovery.
It seems that this device doesn\'t have a Bluetooth controller available. \nAttendance works only with Bluetooth, so please try again on a different device. \nThe app will be now terminated.
As a safety measure, all users are required to change their password during their first log in. Fill the required fields correctly to change your password.
